resources

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • resources.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button

    public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    A parent class for GameObjects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<GameObject> clickableObjects
      A list of the GameObjects that are currently clickable.
      Sprite currentSprite
      The sprite that is currently being displayed.
      int id
      The GameObject identifier.
      java.awt.Point location
      The location of the top-left corner of the object.
      static java.util.List<GameObject> objects
      A list of all the GameObjects in the application.
      java.lang.reflect.Method onClick
      The method to execute on click, if the object is clickable.
      java.lang.Object[] onClickArgs
      Arguments for the method that executes on click, if the object is clickable.
      java.lang.Object onClickReferenceObject
      Reference object for the method that executes on click, if the object is clickable.
      Sprite[] sprites
      An array containing the sprites that the object can display.

                  BufferedDevice device)

        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the object.
        y - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the object.
        endx - The x-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the object.
        endy - The y-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the object.
        srcx1 - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the source image.
        srcy1 - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the source image.
        srcx2 - The x-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the source image.
        srcy2 - The y-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the source image.
        images - The images that the object can display.
        device - The BufferedDevice which contains the object.

                          java.awt.Image[] images)
        Changes the available images for the GameObject.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the object.
        y - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the object.
        endx - The x-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the object.
        endy - The y-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the object.
        srcx1 - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the source image.
        srcy1 - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the source image.
        srcx2 - The x-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the source image.
        srcy2 - The y-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the source image.
        images - The images that the object can display.

      • setMovement

        public void setMovement(int x,
                        int y)
        Sets the movement of the object.
        Parameters:
        x - The value to add to the x-coordinate of the top-left corner each tick.
        y - The value to add to the y-coordinate of the top-left corner each tick.

      • move

        public void move(int x,
                 int y)
        Moves the object.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the destination.
        y - The y-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the destination.

                 int y,

                 int srcx1,

                 int srcy2)
        Moves the object.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the destination.
        y - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the destination.
        endx - The x-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the destination.
        endy - The y-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the destination.
        srcx1 - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the source.
        srcy1 - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the source.
        srcx2 - The x-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the source.
        srcy2 - The y-coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the source.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Draws the object's current sprite on the given Graphics object at the given x and y coordinates.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object to draw the image on.
        x - The x-coordinate to draw the image at.
        y - The y-coordinate to draw the image at.
